entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
